channel.title: power on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in power on Barefoot Rob

item.title: dear summer
item.description: 14:28 Saturday 08 July 2017 JST While preparing to post my question to /r/emacs, the power went off in our house. The circuit breaker flipped. Lin’s AC and my computer + monitors are apparently on the same circuit, which seems weird, but I guess it was not the neighborhood losing power. Oh, so while my computer battery is still fine, I cannot post the post while the router has no power.

item.title: how do you say コンセント in Japanese?
item.description: 12:34 Wednesday 28 September 2016 JST I came to CoCoIchiban curry place because the others I’ve visited featured electric outlets where my computer can sip the sweet sweet AC it craves from time to time. I asked the waitress コンセントがありますか and she was like, “?????” as if I had said “yo yall gots outlets here?”
